subject: Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams had 20 points and 14 assists, Carlos Boozer had 26 points and 10 rebounds and the visiting Utah Jazz added to the Nets’ woes, handing them their fifth straight loss.
snippet: Deron Williams had 20 points and 14 assists, Carlos Boozer had 26 points and 10 rebounds and the visiting Utah Jazz added to the Nets’ woes, handing them their fifth straight loss.
